thread.title: McGarrett Groth

author: McGarrett Groth
title: McGarrett Groth
text: I ordered a set of theater seats and had a question about shipping after my order. I spoke with Fernando Reyes and he was very nice and very helpful. He answered my questions better than I could have hoped for and even told me the exact date my shipment will arrive at local terminal and what to expect from there. To my surprise, the theater seats were ahead of schedule! Also, he gave me his direct phone number in case I have any issues or concerns about my order upon delivery! Appreciated all his help and would recommend anyone to do business with him as you just can't beat great customer service! A+
